Pre-Game Insights: The Orlando Magic have won each of their last 28 home games against teams that held a losing record.
The Jazz have lost 17 of their last 18 games against opponents who are on the first leg of a back-to-back.
The Magic have covered the spread in nine of their last 10 home games following a win.
The Jazz have failed to cover the spread in five of their last six games against opponents who are on the first leg of a back-to-back.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Jazz looked like a completely different team in last night's big upset win over the Heat, while the Magic were going through some major struggles before they took down the lowly Raptors on Friday.
The Jazz have been one of the coldest teams in the league lately.
